content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Good afternoon, thank you for coming to view the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your suggested price for the property?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to accept the price of 700 Euros per month.

Can you give me a breakdown of the monthly costs?

Thank you for your interest in the apartment.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Of course, the monthly rental price of 700 Euros includes the utilities, maintenance and upkeep of the property. It's important to note that this is also a one-time fee that covers all the expenses for the duration of the lease agreement. Can you provide me with some information about your profession and why you are interested in renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My profession is a student and I am looking for a place to stay while I study in the city. I have a part-time job and I am planning to stay in the city for at least a year.

I am interested in this property because of its prime location and the reasonable rental price. I am very happy with the arrangement and I am planning to sign the lease agreement once we reach a final agreement.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Thank you for sharing that information. It's great to hear that you are a student and that you are looking for a comfortable and affordable place to stay while you study in the city. I appreciate your interest in the property and I am happy to hear that you are happy with the arrangement. That being said, I would like to propose a slightly higher rental price of 750 Euros per month. This price takes into account the market value of similar properties in the area and the fact that this apartment is in a prime location. I believe this price is reasonable and would be a good investment for me as a landlord. What do you think about this proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
